metadata.llm_instructions: Please tailor the resume for the provided job description. Emphasize the most relevant experiences and reorder sections if needed to prioritize alignment with the job. Keep the structure the same. DO NOT remove sections unless instructed. Adjust wording to match the tone and keywords from the job description.

summary.text: Full-Stack Developer specializing in scalable, data-driven applications with expertise in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud platforms...
summary.adjustment_instructions: Update to align with the job description focus areas such as AI, leadership, frontend/backend balance, or domain expertise.

skills.adjustment_instructions: If appropriate, prioritize or re-order the most job-relevant skills higher in the list. Do not remove any skills unless specified.

professional_experience.title: Data & Analytics Lead Developer / Data Analyst
professional_experience.description: Developed data-driven applications, automation tools, and real-time analytics dashboards to optimize marketing performance, finance forecasting, and sales operations...
achievements: Built a React/Node analytics platform integrating BigQuery & Salesforce, cutting report generation time by 85%...
Developed a marketing spend forecasting system...
Led creation of an email marketing performance tracker...
Built a PPC tracking link generator...
Collaborated on Salesforce migration and data warehouse setup...
professional_experience.adjustment_instructions: Tailor language toward technical leadership, AI tools, data platform modernization if relevant to the job.

professional_experience.title: Search Engine Optimization Analyst
professional_experience.description: Drove organic growth strategies, data-driven SEO analysis, and performance tracking...
achievements: Automated keyword monitoring and site audits...
professional_experience.adjustment_instructions: Frame SEO and analytics experience as part of broader data-driven decision making.

professional_experience.title: Founder & Full Stack Developer / Marketing Consultant
professional_experience.description: Founded and led a marketing technology firm...
achievements: Built and automated A/B testing frameworks...
Designed and deployed marketing automation workflows...
professional_experience.adjustment_instructions: Emphasize entrepreneurship, technical breadth, and marketing-tech integrations.

projects.title: Nexus: Data-Driven Analytics & Reporting System
projects.description: Led development of enterprise analytics platform that automated KPI tracking across 5 departments...
projects.adjustment_instructions: Emphasize KPI tracking, automation, and scale if relevant to the job.

projects.title: SEO Analytics & Competitive Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a custom dashboard to track keyword rankings, competitor insights, and backlink health...
achievements: Integrated Ahrefs API to automate SEO tracking...
Enabled marketing teams to refine SEO strategies...
Replaced manual spreadsheets with automated insights...
projects.adjustment_instructions: Frame SEO work as part of broader data analytics and performance tracking.

notes.final_instructions: Once the object is updated, ensure that field names remain exactly the same. Do not add new fields. Do not remove required fields. Only adjust content.
